card.name: Courtyard
card.text: +3 Card, Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

card.name: Pawn
card.text: Choose two: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.).

card.name: Secret Chamber
card.text: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. - When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

card.name: Great Hall
card.text: 1 Victory, +1 Card, +1 Action.

card.name: Masquerade
card.text: +2 Card, Each player passes a card in their hand to the player on their left. You may trash a card from your hand.

card.name: Shanty Town
card.text: +2 Actions, Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

card.name: Steward
card.text: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: Swindler
card.text: +2 Coins, Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

card.name: Wishing Well
card.text: +1 Card, +1 Action, Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

card.name: Baron
card.text: +1 Buy, You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

card.name: Bridge
card.text: +1 Buy, +1 Coin. All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

card.name: Conspirator
card.text: +2 Coins. If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action.

card.name: Coppersmith
card.text: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.

card.name: Ironworks
card.text: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. If it is an... Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +1 Coin. Victory card, +1 Card.

card.name: Mining Village
card.text: +1 Card, +2 Actions. You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.

card.name: Scout
card.text: +1 Action. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

card.name: Duke
card.text: Worth 1 Victory per Duchy you have.

card.name: Minion
card.text: +1 Action, Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

card.name: Saboteur
card.text: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

card.name: Torturer
card.text: +3 Card, Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

card.name: Trading Post
card.text: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

card.name: Tribute
card.text: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an... Action Card, +2 Actions; Treasure Card, +2 Coins; Victory Card, +2 Cards.

card.name: Upgrade
card.text: +1 Card, +1 Action, Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

card.name: Harem
card.text: 2 Coins, 2 Victory.

card.name: Nobles
card.text: 2 Victory, Choose one: +3 Cards, or +2 Actions.
